mention_address: "Cesar Chavez Park, Spinnaker Way, Berkeley Marina, Berkeley, Alameda County, California, 94710, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: Wonderful way to enjoy the beauty of the bay with a morning run! The indigenous birds and terrain keep it real.
Nature park in the San Francisco Bay. About 1 mile round walk. Brilliant for wildlife. We have seen groud squirrels (hard to avoid) Jack Rabbits, Raccoon, Possum, Herons... read more
Beautiful ambiance. Look for American coots, cormorants, California seagulls in adjacent waters. Swallows abound. Great kite flying venue. Nice walk around the perimeter.
This is a great park to take the dogs and let them roam off-leash (in the off-leash area) - lots for them to sniff and a few trails for them to run on. Plus, good views of the... read more
Easy walk around with continuous views of Oakland, Berkeley, bay and San Francisco. Plenty of parking, sea breezes.
